use_cases.name: Ingest & Classify New Documents
use_cases.description: Handles newly arrived documents placed in the 'New_Documents' folder. The system checks if they are already known (via hash). If not, they are indexed and moved to 'In_Processing' for classification.

rules.reason: All new files should be processed for the first time.
Files already in processing do not need special handling in this use case.
Existing duplicates are out of scope for new document ingestion.

use_cases.name: Normal In_Processing Classification
use_cases.description: Covers the standard classification flow for documents currently in the 'In_Processing' folder. After classification, they will be moved to either 'Classified' or 'Duplicates' if a hash match is found.

rules.reason: Documents are classified using the existing classification decision tree, then moved to 'Classified' or 'Duplicates' as appropriate.
Use case pertains only to documents already in 'In_Processing'.
Documents that are already classified do not require normal processing.
Duplicates remain duplicates unless specifically reclassified.
